text: The 2024 FIFA Futsal World Cup was held in Uzbekistan from to . It was the tenth edition of the tournament and the first time it was hosted by Uzbekistan. A total of 24 teams from six confederations participated in the event. == Key Details == * Host Country: Uzbekistan * Dates: September 14 â€“ October 6, 2024 * Final Venue: Humo Arena, Tashkent * Champion: (6th title) * Runners-up: * Third Place: * Fourth Place: * Top Scorer: Marcel (10 goals) Brazil won the tournament by defeating Argentina 2-1 in the final. Ukraine secured third place by beating France 7-1. == References == Category:FIFA competitions Category:Futsal
title: 2024 FIFA Futsal World Cup
